Package.Name: componentA
Package.Title: Component A
Package.Description: This component does not depend on any other component.

Package.Name: componentB
Package.Title: Component B
Package.Description: This component does not depend on any other component.

Package.Name: componentC
Package.Title: Component C (depends on A and B)
Package.Description: This component depends on Component A and Component B. Selecting this component for installation also marks Component A and Component B for installation, which in turn marks Component D, because it has an automatic dependency on Component A and Component B.

Package.Name: componentD
Package.Title: Component D (auto depends on A and B)
Package.Description: This component has an automatic dependency on Component A and Component B. If both A and B are marked for installation, this component is also installed.

Package.Name: componentE
Package.Title: Component E (forced)
Package.Description: This is a forced component that is always installed.

Package.Name: componentF.subcomponent1.subsubcomponent1
Package.Title: Subsubcomponent 1
Package.Description: This component does not depend on any other component.

Package.Name: componentF.subcomponent1.subsubcomponent2
Package.Title: Subsubcomponent 2
Package.Description: This component does not depend on any other component.

Package.Name: componentF.subcomponent2.subsubcomponent1
Package.Title: Subsubcomponent 1
Package.Description: This component does not depend on any other component.

Package.Name: componentF.subcomponent2.subsubcomponent2
Package.Title: Subsubcomponent 2
Package.Description: This component does not depend on any other component.

Package.Name: componentG
Package.Title: Component G (default, depends on A, dependency added dynamically)
Package.Description: By default, this component is selected for installation. It depends on component A. Dependency is added from inside component script.

Package.Name: componentH
Package.Title: Component H
Package.Description: This component does not depend on any other component.

Package.Name: componentI
Package.Title: Component I
Package.Description: This component has an automatic dependency on Component C. If C is marked for installation, this component is also installed.
